strapiEvent.name: Herb Window Garden (Make & Take)
strapiEvent.location: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks - Fayetteville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
Our Director of Horticulture, Berni Kurz, will teach us about growing herbs!

Each guest will transplant herbs into a window planter for their home indoor window garden. Guests will also be served infused water and will receive recipes to utilize the herbs they will grow.

$50/members or $60/nonmembers
